Author: Jake Peyser
name: Capital Weather
description: Capital Weather is a sample Bluemix application which utilizes the Weather Channel service, two mapping APIs, Leaflet and Esri Leaflet, and the Google Maps Geocoding API. It allows users to visualize the current weather in all the world capitals, as well as obtain historical weather data and future weather projections. The app provides a real world use case of the Weather Channel API and implements several of the methods exposed by that interface.

Author: Jake Peyser
name: Banking and minimum viable services
description: New Bluemix sample app demonstrating how modern, user-centric banking apps can be built and run on Bluemix using microservice architecture.

Author: Jake Peyser
name: Supply Chain Weather Overview
description: Supply Chain Weather is a sample Bluemix application which utilizes the Insights for Weather service and two mapping APIs, Leaflet and Esri Leaflet to dynamically create and augment shipments for a retail chain store's supply chain.
services: Insights for Weather, Leaflet, Esri Leaflet
